stack.description:
This stack contains packages for the Kurtana robot. Specifically:
configuration files for the arm_navigation pipeline: kinematics, motion planning, trajectory filtering, collision map (package kurtana_arm_navigation)
launch files to bring up the physical Kurtana (package kurtana_bringup)
launch files to bring up the Kurtana in Gazebo (package kurtana_gazebo)
a node to publish the joint states of the Kinect pole (package kurtana_pole_joint_commander)
